posts.title: MERN Stack Firebase Starter Kit
posts.subtitle: A template I've put together to help get up and running with MERN stack on Google Firebase

posts.title: My Public Site
posts.subtitle: This website, built using React, Redux, MongoDB, and Chakra UI

posts.title: Trading Bot
posts.subtitle: Python bot that can be configured to automate trading by analysing intervals and setting a stoploss. Consumes Coinspot's API

posts.title: Support Ticket System Library in Go
posts.subtitle: A library that can be used to create extensions for ticket management systems. This can be used by backend services to implement custom support systems which can be consumed by any client. Currently this project is in development, and I will be providing updates regularly on the main repository.
